form.label: Network Analysis
form.description: Gives analytics on the Domains, IP's, URI's, URL's seen on the Honeypots

search.query: index=honeypot domain=* | rex field=domain "(?<domain>https?://[^/)|/>]*)" | top domain | eval domainhash=sha1(domain) | rename domain AS "Domain" count AS "Count" percent AS "Percent" | table "Domain", domainhash, "Count", "Percent" | rename domainhash AS "Domain Hash"
index=honeypot urls=* NOT "Search\\r\\nConnection" | stats dc(domain) as Count values(domain) as domain by uri_path | where Count > 1 | sort - Count | fields - Count

index=honeypot cmd=* ip=* | table ip, cmd, session_hash,src_ip, _time | rename ip AS "IP Address" session_hash AS "Session Hash" src_ip AS "Attacker IP", _time AS "Time", cmd AS "Command" | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | sort - Time
